user_query: How truthful is the statement that "Incidence rates of cervical cancer have decreased."? Present a series of factual points about the statement.
text-davinci-002_response: The statement is mostly true. Incidence rates of cervical cancer have decreased in the United States and many other countries. However, rates have not decreased everywhere, and cervical cancer is still a major problem in many parts of the world.
text-davinci-002_fact: Incidence rates of cervical cancer have decreased in the United States.
Many other countries have also witnessed a decrease in the incidence rates of cervical cancer.
There are places where the rates of cervical cancer have not decreased.
Cervical cancer remains a significant problem in many parts of the world.
